statements: SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails;
SELECT check_id, check_type FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_result = TRUE;
SELECT check_type, check_timestamp FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT check_id, check_result FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails ORDER BY check_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT check_id, check_type, check_result FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT check_id, check_timestamp FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_result = TRUE ORDER BY check_timestamp ASC;
SELECT check_id, check_type FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_result = FALSE AND check_type IN ('A', 'B', 'C');
SELECT * FROM ComplianceChecksAuditTrails WHERE check_type LIKE '%Type%' ORDER BY check_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, check_name, created_at FROM compliance_checks;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status='PENDING';
SELECT check_name, check_type FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, check_name, check_type, check_status FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status='PENDING' AND check_type='Type1';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id=123 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status='PENDING';
SELECT check_name, check_type, created_at FROM compliance_checks WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_type='INTERNAL' ORDER BY check_name;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE event_type='SYSTEM' AND user_id=100 ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_description FROM audit_trails WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks;
SELECT id, check_name, status FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT check_name, status FROM compliance_checks WHERE status = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM traceability WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT action_taken, user_id, timestamp FROM traceability ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, check_name FROM compliance_checks WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE action = 'Login' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT action_taken, user_id FROM traceability WHERE timestamp < '2022-03-01 12:00:00';
SELECT id, action FROM audit_trails UNION SELECT id, action_taken FROM traceability ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_checks;
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = TRUE;
SELECT check_name, check_description, check_status FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, department FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT check_name, check_description FROM compliance_checks WHERE check_status = true;
SELECT users.username, user_activities.activity_description FROM users JOIN user_activities ON users.user_id = user_activities.user_id;
SELECT trail_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceCheck;
SELECT check_name, check_status FROM ComplianceCheck WHERE compliance_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM User ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM User WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT dept_name, location FROM Department WHERE manager_id = 101 ORDER BY dept_name;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceCheck WHERE compliance_id = 1;
SELECT check_name, check_status FROM ComplianceCheck WHERE check_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, action, details FROM AuditTrail ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM User WHERE username = 'john.doe';
SELECT dept_name, location FROM Department WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
